sprint.name: Cow Profile Management
sprint.description: Implement full CRUD for cow profiles with offline support, allowing farmers to manage their herd.

user_stories.title: View Cow List
user_stories.description: As a farmer, I want to see a list of all my cows so that I can manage my herd.

tasks.title: Create cow list page
tasks.description: Build page with list of cow cards showing name, breed, weight, and status.

tasks.title: Create cow card component
tasks.description: Build reusable card showing cow avatar, name, breed, current state (lactating/dry/calf).

tasks.title: Implement pull-to-refresh
tasks.description: Add pull-to-refresh gesture to reload cow list from API.

tasks.title: Create skeleton loader for list
tasks.description: Build skeleton placeholder while cow list is loading.

tasks.title: Create empty state component
tasks.description: Show friendly empty state with 'Add your first cow' CTA when no cows exist.

tasks.title: Implement local-first data loading
tasks.description: Load cows from Dexie first, then sync with API in background.

acceptance_criteria: List shows all user's cows with key details
Empty state shows when no cows

user_stories.title: Add New Cow
user_stories.description: As a farmer, I want to add a new cow to my herd so that I can track and optimize its diet.

tasks.title: Create add cow form page
tasks.description: Build form with all cow profile fields: name, breed, weight, state, milk production, etc.

tasks.title: Implement cow state selector
tasks.description: Create state selector (Lactating, Dry, Pregnant, Calf) that shows/hides relevant fields.

tasks.title: Build weight input with validation
tasks.description: Create numeric input for body weight with min/max validation.

tasks.title: Build milk production fields
tasks.description: Create inputs for target milk yield, fat %, protein % (shown only for lactating cows).

tasks.title: Build pregnancy fields
tasks.description: Create inputs for gestation day, parity (shown for pregnant/lactating cows).

tasks.title: Implement form validation
tasks.description: Add comprehensive validation with inline error messages.

tasks.title: Connect to create cow API
tasks.description: Submit to POST /cow-profiles/ with optimistic UI update.

tasks.title: Implement offline cow creation
tasks.description: Queue cow creation locally if offline, sync when back online.

acceptance_criteria: Form has all required fields: name, breed, weight, state
Conditional fields show based on cow state
Success shows confirmation and returns to list

test_cases.title: Create Lactating Cow
steps: Fill form with lactating cow details

user_stories.title: View Cow Details
user_stories.description: As a farmer, I want to view detailed information about a specific cow so that I can monitor its status.

tasks.title: Create cow detail page
tasks.description: Build page showing all cow information in organized sections.

tasks.title: Display cow information sections
tasks.description: Show sections for basic info, production data, and recent diets.

tasks.title: Show recent diet history
tasks.description: Display last 5 diet recommendations for this cow.

tasks.title: Add quick action buttons
tasks.description: Add buttons for 'Get Diet', 'Log Milk', 'Edit', 'Delete'.

acceptance_criteria: All cow details display in organized layout
Recent diet history shows if available
Page loads quickly from local cache

test_cases.title: View Details
test_cases.expected_result: Cow detail page shows all information

test_cases.title: Quick Action - Get Diet
test_cases.expected_result: Navigates to diet form with cow pre-selected

user_stories.title: Edit Cow Profile
user_stories.description: As a farmer, I want to update my cow's information as it changes over time.

tasks.title: Create edit cow form
tasks.description: Reuse add form with pre-populated data for editing.

tasks.title: Implement optimistic update
tasks.description: Update UI immediately, revert on API failure.

tasks.title: Handle offline edits
tasks.description: Queue edits locally when offline, sync when online.

tasks.title: Show edit confirmation
tasks.description: Display toast notification on successful update.

acceptance_criteria: Form pre-populates with current cow data

user_stories.title: Delete Cow
user_stories.description: As a farmer, I want to remove a cow from my herd when sold or deceased.

tasks.title: Add delete button with confirmation
tasks.description: Add delete option with confirmation dialog.

tasks.title: Implement soft delete for sync
tasks.description: Mark as deleted locally, sync deletion to server.

tasks.title: Handle cascade effects
tasks.description: Handle related data (diets, logs) appropriately on delete.

acceptance_criteria: Cow removed from list after confirmation

user_stories.title: Cow Store (Pinia)
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want centralized cow state management for consistent data access.

tasks.title: Create cows Pinia store
tasks.description: Build store with state, getters, and actions for cow CRUD.

tasks.title: Implement Dexie integration
tasks.description: Connect store to Dexie for local persistence.

tasks.title: Add sync status tracking
tasks.description: Track sync status per cow (synced, pending, error).

tasks.title: Implement computed getters
tasks.description: Add getters for filtered cows (by state, by sync status).

acceptance_criteria: Store manages all cow data centrally
Sync status is trackable per cow

sprint_goals: Full offline support for cow management
definition_of_done: All CRUD operations work online and offline
Optimistic UI updates with proper error handling
Data syncs correctly when coming back online
Forms have proper validation and feedback
